text: The Central Connecticut Blue Devils women's basketball team represents Central Connecticut State University in New Britain, Connecticut, United States. The school's team currently competes in the Northeast Conference. ==History== Central Connecticut began play in 1971. They played in Division II from 1971-1986. As of the end of the 2015-16 season, the Blue Devils have an all- time record of 467-673. They have never made the NCAA Tournament, but they have made the WNIT in 2009 and 2015. ==Season-by-season results== {| class="wikitable" |- align="center" |-style="background: #ffffdd;" | colspan="8" align="center" | Division I |-style="background: #ffffdd;" | colspan="8" align="center" | Northeast Conference ==References== ==External links== *
